name: Teen TV Shows Multiple Choice Quiz | TV Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Kerr Smith.

	Jack was Joey's boyfriend before admitting he was gay.

questions.text: Who does Angel team up with in 'Angel' from the Sunnydale gang?
questions.explanation:
Cordelia.

	Wesley also joins the "Angel" cast as season one neared its end. Wesley and Faith both appeared at the end of 'Angel's' first season.

questions.text: He has a love interest named Liz in 'Roswell'.
questions.explanation:
Max.

	Max is played by sexy Jason Behr.

questions.text: What is the last name of Jennifer Love Hewitt's character in "Party of Five" and "Time of Your Life"?
questions.explanation:
Reeves & Merrin.

	In "Time of Your Life", a spin-off to "PO5", Sarah goes to New York to find her biological father.

questions.text: Who was paired off with their gorgeous next door neighbor in season two of 'Charmed'?
questions.explanation:
Piper.

	Greg Vaughn played Piper's love interest Dan.

questions.text: Two of the many stars in this show are Bryce Johnson and Leslie Bibb.

questions.correct: Buffy Anne Summers & Buffy Ann Summers
questions.explanation:
Buffy Anne Summers & Buffy Ann Summers.

	"Buffy The Vampire Slayer" ended its run in 2003 after seven seasons. Buffy was played by Sarah Michelle Gellar.

questions.text: What is the name of Sabrina's cat in "Sabrina, the Teenage Witch"?
Who is the oldest Camden daughter?
On "That '70s Show", what kind of character does Mila Kunis play?
questions.explanation:
spoiled.

	Mila plays the spoiled Jackie Berkhardt.
